title: Ep. 59: A Beautiful Mess of a Playoff Picture
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark discuss the Giants defense (1:25), the massive playoff implications from Sunday's games (9:55), their "spotlight guys" (29:49), and which NFL players would be best at dodgeball (39:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
